description: A hidden room within Thriller Bark where Perona's physical body rests while she projects her astral form. The room is concealed behind a door, protecting her vulnerable real body while she uses her Horo Horo no Mi powers remotely. Discovery of this location is the key to defeating her.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Discovers Perona's Hidden Room
keyEvents.description: Following his deduction about Perona's weakness, Usopp discovers the hidden door to Perona's room where her real body is located.
keyEvents.significance: The pivotal discovery that exposes Perona's critical vulnerability and allows Usopp to defeat her.

keyEvents.title: Door Destroyed by Atlas Suisei
keyEvents.description: Usopp uses his Atlas Suisei technique to destroy the door to Perona's room, revealing her physical body's location.
keyEvents.significance: The decisive moment that breaks through Perona's final defense.

description: The world's largest pirate ship, Thriller Bark is a massive vessel resembling an island, commanded by Gecko Moria. It serves as the setting for ongoing battles between the Straw Hat Pirates and Moria's forces.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Moria Continues
keyEvents.description: Luffy continues his battle against Gecko Moria on Thriller Bark, facing the Warlord's shadow manipulation abilities.
keyEvents.significance: Ongoing confrontation between Luffy and one of the Seven Warlords.

keyEvents.title: Usopp vs Perona Battle
keyEvents.description: Usopp engages in a desperate battle against Perona across various areas of Thriller Bark.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle showcasing Usopp's growth as a strategist.
